definitions.definition: A period of time when a person occupies a position only conditionally and may easily be removed for poor performance
definitions.example: You'll be on probation for first six months. After that, if you work out, they'll hire you permanently.

definitions.definition: A type of sentence where convicted criminals are allowed to continue living in the community but will automatically be sent to jail if they violate certain conditions
definitions.example: He got two years probation for robbery.
